content: this intermediate knitting pattern features a classic cable design worked on double-pointed needles the hat project uses two balls of super bulky bernat softee chunky yarn which works up fast and offers excellent stitch definition top it with a pompom for a fun look materials set of 4 sizes u s 10½ 6 5 mm and u s 11 8 mm double-pointed knitting needles or size needed to obtain gauge cable needle stitch marker
